branchCategory.name: NC(D)G, Cylinder, Single Acting, Single Rod, Spring Return/Extend
branchCategory.description: Standard NCG single acting single rod version. Available in spring return or spring extend. The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed.  Nine mounting styles are available for cylinder mounting flexibility.   Bore sizes for the NCG range from 3/4"(20mm) to 1 1/2" (40mm).  The NCG series is auto-switch capable.

relatedProductsItem.name: Auto Switch, Solid State, General Purpose
NCG, Accessory, Trunnion / Double Clevis Bracket
